states.text:
Professor Orchid: Hello and welcome to the world of pokemon, my name is Professor Orchid, and I'll be your guide through your journey across Paseagon. There are many new pokemon for you to discover, and I sense that you are excited for a new adventure.

But before that, tell me if you are a boy or a girl.

Oh, you're a {m:boy;f:girl}.
Now since our introduction is complete, what are you waiting for? Come on down to my lab today, and we'll gift you a free starter for you to start your very first pokemon journey.

Xavier's Mother: Hurry up sweetie, if not you are going to be late
Xavier: Ugh... Yes, I'm coming mom... Just wait for a bit.
Xavier's Mother: I know this is a new experience for you and it might be scary, but I want to see you out and about and happy again, leave all of that behind in the past, besides, ${user} and ${rival} are coming with you, it will be all okay, sweetie.
\*Xavier nodded nonchalantly\*
\*Xavier exits the house\*
Xavier: Oh... I didn't know you two were outside, waiting for me... I'm sorry for delaying the meet up.
${rival}: It's ok Xavier, we only just got here.
Xavier: Oh... Ok. It's nice to see both of you again.
${rival}: Yes! How long has it been though... like two years?
Xavier: Yep... I'm sorry for... not meeting up with both of you during that time... both of you must have been so worried haha.
${rival}: It's nothing Xavier, right now we can make up for lost time.
Xavier: mhm.
${rival}: Come on, let's go to Professor Orchid's lab.
Xavier: Alright... let's go.

Professor Orchid: Hello kids, what are you here for?
${rival}: We are here to collect our starters, Ms. Orchid.
Professor Orchid: Right. Hm let's see. Ah I have one more batch of starters to give away, would you like them?
${rival}: Yes please!
Professor Orchid: Alright, who will pick first?
${rival}: I think ${user} should pick first
Xavier: \*nods\*
Professor Orchid: Pick your starter then, ${user}.

\*You and Xavier are about to leave the lab\*
${rival}: Hey ${user}, wanna have a battle? I wanna try my new starter Pokemon out!

${user} has been challenged by ${rival} to a battle!

buttons.label: Click here to skip the battle

states.text:
${rival}: That was a really fun battle! I'll be looking forward to battling you again, ${user}. But for now, we should better get going...
Hmm... Let's head to Route 1, shall we?
\*You and Xavier nod\*
Where would you like to go?

\*The 3 of you head upstairs\*
You find 3 rooms, 2 opened, one locked
You try to enter the locked room to check up on Xavier's sister but then Xavier's mother comes over.
Xavier's Mother: Oh you're checking up on Sarah. The explosion 2 years ago hit both of them hard, especially since they had lost their uncle in that explosion. I just wish, I could see the both of them out together playing with you and ${rival} again. Sarah is now treating that room like it is her tomb. I hope that one day she can come out of that room to spend time with all of us, but I don't think that would happen.
*You then leave the house along with Xavier and ${rival}*

${rival}: Ok, since we're here, let me show you how to catch a wild pokemon
Battle: WIP
${rival}: That's how you do it, now the Professor asked me to give you two this.
**${user} received a Pokedex.
${user} received 20 Pokeballs.**
What would you like to do?

\*The 3 of you enter the hustling and bustling Mizora City\*
Xavier: W-wow... The city has become so beautiful... and so busy while I was gone...
${rival}: Yup! I come here to pick up stuff for Mom at the Pokemart all the time!
The 3 of you see a man in a pilot suit unlocking the door of the Gym
${rival}: Oh look! That's Skyler, the gym leader of Mizora City! I've been wanting to battle him for so long~
Xavier: Oh.. Well maybe we should try... to beat the gym together?
${rival}: Well, I do wanna explore around here for a bit, and... OH, I KNOW! Xavier, you know how you loved eating chocolate casteliacones? I think they sell some here!
Hey ${user}, you can go on and challenge the gym first alright? We'll meet each other at Route 2, how does that sound?
Xavier: Oh... chocolate... I haven't tasted it in 2 years...
${user}: Well then it's settled, see you later!
Where would you like to go?

\*You enter the gym, and see what looks to be a pilot-training area\*
Skyler: Ah! Welcome to my gym, dear challenger! This gym here has quite a bit of history, it was where the first airplane in the world took off! Unfortunately, that runway is no longer suited for the planes we have now, so I've repurposed it as my gym! As you may have noticed, I'm an expert in the skies and flying-type pokemon! I hope your team is ready to go through some rough turbulence!

${rival}: Hmm... I wonder what I should buy, ${m:there are so many new dresses I wanna try! I've even heard that some of these were designed by Elesa and Valerie! Eeeeek! I wonder if I could be as famous as Kalos Queen Serena is by wearing these~ Hehe~;f:I'm currently saving up some money to get a new laptop since my old one's battery got fried, but maybe spending a few pokedollars on the latest horror book series by Shauntal wouldn't hurt either. I heard the latest installment is about a young boy overcoming the grief of losing his younger sister... *sniff sniff* the thought of losing you already makes me worried!!}
